properties.sfomuseum:creditline: Gift of the Pan Am Association
properties.sfomuseum:description: Menu issued by Pan American World Airways; reproduction of watercolor of Boeing 747 with caption, "Clipper Young America arrives in London on the first commercial flight by the new generation of wide-body jets, January 22, 1970"; includes information about historic flight and artist; menu items include caviar, tenderloin of beef, French lamb chops, and filet of sole; menu number: 101D; class: Clipper (business); date: 8-23-84.
properties.sfomuseum:series: Historic First Flights Series; cover illustrations by John T. McCoy
properties.wof:name: menu: Pan American World Airways, Historic First Flights series, Boeing 747
